title: Autonomous Code Versioning Document (ACVD)
description: Defines the structure for recording autonomous code evolution decisions and outcomes.

acvd_version.description: Version of the ACVD schema standard.

source_system.description: Identifier of the AGI instance generating the ACVD.

context_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the system state context required for verification.

decision_summary.description: High-level natural language summary of the changes and objectives.

artifact_changes.description: List of files modified, created, or deleted.

hash_before.description: Hash prior to operation (null for CREATE).

hash_after.description: Hash after operation (null for DELETE). Required for integrity validation.
